comment.author: 63364892@N00
comment._content:
Great to see Wattamolla as it used to be without all the stupid safety fences and signage prohibiting absolutely everything - all of which is totally useless because most people go there and jump off the cliff anyway.  

The cliff jump was the main reason it was such a great place to go to as an outlet for teen exuberance and displays of bravado.  In those times if you hurt yourself it was your own bloody fault.  

God I'm sounding old tonight.
